description: I worked for VisionX LLC as an Fullstack Developer
title: VisionX LLC Fullstack Developer

content.title: innerContent
content: Redesigned, implemented, and updated the company's official website using Python Django framework
Developed the web page using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and adapted the web page to mobile users
Integrated SQLite Database to store views and handle backend API calls through Django's HTML module
Deployed the website to an AWS server using Nginx as the web server, resulting in over 30,000+ views

content.title: innerContent
content: Designed and update backend RESTful APIs to meet frontend's requirements
Created and optimized databases storing users, experts, and forums in MongoDB
Implemented RESTful APIs including modifying databases, search, and ChatGPT API usage
Successfully updated both databases and 7 APIs, adequately managed data, and return structured JSON responses.

content.title: innerConclusion
content.content:
During the job, I learned Django a lot. It is a framework that can used to develop both frontend and backend. I feel amazing when I first study this framework since it has some new things compared with other frameworks.
This job also improve my teamwork ability. By working with a lot of people, I acquired more knowledge on project management and organization. I tried to organize my project better and coding more clear in the future projects, where the project “Duck Duck Ride” is an example. Making project more organized is better for people to develop.
